dalserver.sia

Class SiapKeywordFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • dalserver.KeywordFactory
      • dalserver.sia.SiapKeywordFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable

    public class SiapKeywordFactory
extends KeywordFactory
    SiapKeywordFactory implements a factory class for well-known SIAP keywords, including Groups, Params and Fields. The use of a factory class frees the client from having to know all the detailed metadata associated with each type of keyword. Keywords are indexed by both their ID and UTYPE tags. In general UTYPE is required to ensure uniqueness, but within a limited scope, the ID tag may be sufficient to uniquely identify a keyword without having to know the full UTYPE.

    A list of the major SIAP keywords including the defined ID and UTYPE keys is shown in this table.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SiapKeywordFactory

        public SiapKeywordFactory(java.lang.String model,
                  java.lang.String version)
        Constructor to generate a new SIAP keyword factory. To generate a keyword factory for only the Data element use model="data". To return the main model (both Access and Core), use model="main".
        Parameters:
        model - Data model to be used ("main" or "data").
        version - SIA version (1.x or 2.x).

      • SiapKeywordFactory

        public SiapKeywordFactory()
        Generate a new SIAP keyword factory for the main part of the ImageDM (excluding the Data element).

      • SiapKeywordFactory

        public SiapKeywordFactory(RequestResponse response,
                  java.lang.String model,
                  java.lang.String version)
                   throws DalServerException
        Create a new SIAP keyword factory and initialize an associated request response to process SIAP keywords. This is not required, but allows automated initialization of related context such as the keyword name space.
        Parameters:
        response - RequestResponse object to be linked to the SIAP keyword factory.
        Throws:
        DalServerException

    • Method Detail

      • verbosityMask

        public java.lang.String verbosityMask(java.lang.String verbosity)
        Return the "hint" flag mask corresponding to a given verbosity level.
        Parameters:
        verbosity - The verbosity level (0,1,2,...) as a string. Each keyword may have hint characters hinting at how the keyword is to be used. In this case we use the hint to determine whether a data model keyword is to be returned for a given SIA verbosity level.

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        SIAP keyword-related utilities. 
           ingest [csv-file]    Turn a CSV version of the SIAP data model
                                into a SiapData class which contains raw data
                                defining the data model.

   doc [type]           Generate an HTML version of the SIAP keyword
                                dictionary.

   table [type]         Generate Java code to create the indicated
                                keywords in a RequestResponse object.
